lines.text: DUMMY
create new integers n and k
create new string variable s
read standard input to n and k
read s from the user input
if n - k is less than k
in a for loop , change i from k to n exclusive and print " RIGHT " on each loop iteration
lines.code: for ( int i = k ; i < n ; i ++ ) cout << " RIGHT " << endl ;

lines.text: for integer i = n - 1 to 0 inclusive counting down
lines.code: for ( int i = n - 1 ; i >= 0 ; i -- )

lines.text: print " PRINT " and s [ i ] to the standard output
if i ! = 0 , print " LEFT " to the standard output
DUMMY
else
for integer i = k to 1 exclusive counting down , print " LEFT " to the standard output
lines.code: for ( int i = k ; i > 1 ; i -- ) cout << " LEFT " << endl ;

lines.text: start for loop from i = 0 to n exclusive incrementing i
lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ )

lines.text: print " PRINT " and s [ i ]
if i ! = n - 1 , print " RIGHT "
lines.code: if ( i != n - 1 ) cout << " RIGHT " << endl ;
